title: Did Tramp's director remove the CDC as the COVID-19 hospital data supervisor?
subtitle: As part of its formation as an effort to streamline the reporting process, the Federal Government has ordered hospitals to send patient information to a central database managed by the Ministry of Health.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In July 2020, the US President Donald Trump Department developed new hospital guidelines for reporting patient information from COVID-19, which eliminates disease control and prevention centres as a leader in data collection.
